content: Hi! I'm a Maths undergrad at Cambridge, and I'm keen to contribute to Mathlib4. I've started work formalising the proof of Burnside's p^a q^b theorem - would it be possible to get access to a branch of the mathlib4 repo to push the WIP to? My github username is Genora51
In case you haven't seen it already, you might be interested in #Geographic locality > Cambridge, UK
@Geno Racklin Asher, invite sent!
Geno Racklin Asher has marked this topic as resolved.
